title: The Pier with a Lamp. Round Arches Springing from a Square Column Ornamented with the Heads of Giants with Rings in Their Mouths
medium: etching, engraving, sulphur tint or open bite, burnishing on paper
provenance_text:
M. Knoedler & Co., New York, NY; sold to Kenneth Seaver [1877-1969], Pittsburgh, PA and Oakmont, PA, on April 1, 1927 until December 8, 1948 [1]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1948.

Notes:
[1] Purchased for $55; see original invoice dated April 1, 1927 (for purchases made on February 26, 1927) in curatorial file.
